column1: Today the Senate overwhelmingly passed President Trump’s #USMCA trade deal. This is a huge deal for Nebraska farmers and ranchers — our economy depends on free trade with our neighbors.   Ben couldn’t be more proud to be a part of delivering such an important win for our state. https://t.co/sN0INHgJxV

BREAKING ANNOUNCEMENT: Team Sasse has 93 county chairs - that means we have one in every single county in Nebraska! Our campaign is rolling and we’re gaining momentum. Will you help us keep up our momentum and be a part of the campaign? https://t.co/0ntb7KcnUQ https://t.co/8U7Dpknz9j

Let’s be clear: General Qassem Soleimani had American blood on his hands — and he was bloodthirsty for more. He should be remembered as a terrorist who murdered many and spread evil across the Middle East.   The President made the right call.
